text: Ane jyare te'o pase ko'i ayata pahonce che to evum kahe che ke, ame to kayareya imana nahim lavi'e, jyam sudhi amane pana evi ja vastu apavamam na ave je allahana payagambarone apavamam ave che, a to allaha khuba ja sari rite jane che ke, te kayam potani payagambari rakhe, najikamam ja te lokone, jemane aparadha karyo che, allahani pase apamanita thase ane te'oni mastina badalamam sakhata saja (thase)
